page.title: 03New Industrial Estate
page.content: A new industrial development is currently underway at Peel Park, a gently rolling area on the north western edge of the town and 5 km from the centre. Once again it is situated alongside the Queensway Expressway for ease of access, and it is hoped that high technology and science-based industries will be attracted to the fourteen plots varying in size from 0.3 to 5.7 hectares. Hopefully also, research, development, design and con- sultancy services will come to office sites. Financial aid in the form of grants and tax allowances will be made available to attract firms, whilst custom built factories will be sited in an attractive landscaped area.
